title: Unit 7: Differential Equations
subtitle: Modeling Dynamic Systems with Differential Equations
description: Learn about differential equations, their solutions, and applications in modeling real-world phenomena.
objectives: Understand the concept of differential equations and their solutions
Use slope fields to analyze differential equations
Apply differential equations to model growth and decay
bigIdeas: Differential equations describe rates of change and can model dynamic systems
Separable differential equations can be solved by separating variables
Slope fields provide visual representations of differential equations
Initial value problems combine differential equations with specific conditions
Differential equations are powerful tools for modeling real-world phenomena
Growth and decay models use differential equations to predict behavior over time

lessons.title: Modeling Situations with Differential Equations
lessons.description: Introduction to differential equations and their applications in modeling real-world situations.

lessons.title: Verifying Solutions for Differential Equations
lessons.description: Learn how to verify that a function is a solution to a given differential equation.

lessons.title: Sketching Slope Fields
lessons.description: Create and interpret slope fields to visualize solutions to differential equations.

lessons.title: Reasoning Using Slope Fields
lessons.description: Use slope fields to analyze the behavior of solutions to differential equations.

lessons.title: Finding General Solutions Using Separation of Variables
lessons.description: Solve separable differential equations by separating variables and integrating.

lessons.title: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables
lessons.description: Solve initial value problems using separation of variables and initial conditions.

lessons.title: Exponential Models with Differential Equations
lessons.description: Model exponential growth and decay using differential equations.

prerequisites: Understanding of derivatives and their interpretations
Knowledge of exponential and logarithmic functions
